#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){

     int t;
     cin >> t;
     while(t--)

       {
             int n;
             cin >> n;
               if(n == 1)
               cout <<"1"<<endl;
               else 
               cout <<"0"<<endl;      
     }
     
     return 0;
       

}
